popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: Hello there! Welcome to the introductory tour. This is the Onboarding Pilot, which will guide you through the application.

popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: We won't make this too tiring, so we'll keep it brief with just a rough overview of some main functions.

popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: If a blinking arrow appears, you will need to click or tap on it.

popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: Let’s not waste any time and start with the first section …

popover.title: Your personal inbox
popover.description: The dashboard is your personal inbox. Here, you can see all types of invites, notifications, and favourites.

popover.title: Your inbox
popover.description: It might be a bit empty now, but if other users want to chat with you or collaborate on a document, you’ll find your notifications here.

popover.title: Your inbox
popover.description: If there are any updates, a small dot will appear next to /dashboard in the main navigation.

popover.title: Your inbox
popover.description: You might have already been invited to some spaces. If that’s the case, you can accept those invitations. By clicking on the name, you will be redirected to the space.

popover.title: Your inbox
popover.description: But first, let’s see what’s happening in this application. Let’s head to the /explore page next …

popover.title: Your spaces
popover.description: This is the /explore page. It’s where you can find all the spaces organised by their context.

popover.title: Your spaces
popover.description: You can navigate from level to level and see what’s happening in the different contexts.

popover.title: Your spaces
popover.description: Let’s click on the entry level and move down the tree.

popover.title: Communicate
popover.description: One of the major functionalities is /chat. Here, you can communicate with others in real-time: in one-to-one chats or in group chats.

popover.title: Communicate
popover.description: All your chats will be listed here, separated into private and group chats.

popover.title: Communicate
popover.description: To create a new chat, just click or tap the button at the top.

popover.title: Communicate
popover.description: You can choose to create either a direct message or a group chat.

popover.title: Communicate
popover.description: For group chats, you can control the visibility of the chat room. You can choose to make the room public to all accounts or limit access to invited participants only.

popover.title: Encrypted
popover.description: Be aware of the end-to-end encryption. If you enable this option, all participants will need to store their encryption key securely!

popover.title: Contextualise
popover.description: After creating a group chat, you can later assign it to a specific context via explore, just like a file or a document on your operating system.

popover.title: Going on
popover.description: Speaking of documents, let’s move on to /write next …

popover.title: Let’s create some items.
popover.description: With /write, you can create collaborative text documents.

popover.title: Create it
popover.description: Let’s create a new document as an example, since it’s quite empty here at the moment. Please press the add button at the top.

popover.title: Name it
popover.description: First, give the document a name. It will be visible to others.

popover.title: Protect it
popover.description: If you want to prevent others from viewing the document, you can set a password.

popover.title: Submit it
popover.description: Press the button and *tada* you have created a document. You can now edit it and invite others to join.

popover.title: Library
popover.description: From now on, you can find all the documents you created in /write. Quite handy, isn’t it?

popover.title: Contextualise
popover.description: Don’t forget, you can also add your documents to contexts in /explore, making them visible to others within those contexts.

popover.title: Show yourself
popover.description: Next stop: /account. This is where you can personalise your profile and how it appears to others.

popover.title: What’s your name?
popover.description: You can change your display name to anything you like. However, your official username, i.e. account address, will remain the same and will still be visible to others.

popover.title: Profile picture
popover.description: Fancy adding a photo? It will be visible to others, for example in /chat
We are nearing the end of this onboarding tour. Let’s go back to /explore once more.

popover.title: Browse and add
popover.description: Browse through the structure, request access, or add further contexts or items that interest you to your own spaces.

popover.title: Missing something?
popover.description: If there isn’t much content yet, encourage others to join /spaces and contribute.

popover.title: More?
popover.description: There are many other functions to explore. Just have a look around and try them out.

popover.title: Finished!
popover.description: That’s all for now. You can restart the onboarding at any time via /account. Have fun!
